title: Frontend Developer
description: We are seeking a skilled Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing user-facing web applications using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
requirements: 3+ years experience with React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, responsive design, Git version control

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Looking for a Full Stack Developer with expertise in both frontend and backend technologies. Work with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and modern development practices.
requirements: 4+ years full-stack experience, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Express.js, REST APIs, JavaScript, TypeScript

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our backend team to build scalable APIs and microservices. Experience with Node.js, Python, databases, and cloud platforms required.
requirements: 3+ years backend development, Node.js, Python, SQL, NoSQL, AWS, Docker, microservices architecture

title: React Developer
description: Exciting opportunity for a React specialist to build cutting-edge web applications. Work with the latest React features, hooks, and modern JavaScript.
requirements: 2+ years React experience, JavaScript ES6+, Redux, React Hooks, CSS-in-JS, testing libraries

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Senior role for experienced developer to lead technical initiatives and mentor junior developers. Full-stack development with focus on scalability.
requirements: 7+ years software development, leadership experience, multiple programming languages, system design, mentoring

title: Python Developer
description: Python developer needed for data processing and web application development. Experience with Django, Flask, and data analysis libraries required.
requirements: 3+ years Python development, Django or Flask, pandas, NumPy, SQL, data analysis experience

title: DevOps Engineer
description: DevOps engineer to manage CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and deployment automation. AWS and containerization experience essential.
requirements: 4+ years DevOps experience, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, monitoring

title: Mobile Developer
description: Mobile developer for iOS and Android applications. Experience with React Native or native development required.
requirements: 3+ years mobile development, React Native or Swift/Kotlin, mobile UI/UX, app store deployment

title: Junior Web Developer
description: Entry-level position for new graduates or career changers. Learn and grow with our supportive team while building web applications.
requirements: 0-2 years experience, HTML, CSS, JavaScript basics, eagerness to learn, computer science degree preferred

title: UI/UX Developer
description: UI/UX Developer to bridge design and development. Create beautiful, functional user interfaces with attention to user experience.
requirements: 3+ years UI/UX development, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, design tools (Figma, Adobe), responsive design
